```{r Project setup with rocket example}
n <- 20
realizations <- 0:n/n
prior_probabilities <- realizations * (1-realizations)

posterior_calc <- function(realizations, prior, successes = 1) {
  joint <- realizations ** successes * prior
  return(joint / sum(joint))
}
```
